Package arc.freetype

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    FreeType  
    FreeType.Bitmap  
    FreeType.Face

    FreeType.GlyphMetrics  
    FreeType.GlyphSlot

    FreeType.Size  
    FreeType.SizeMetrics  
    FreeType.Stroker  
    FreeTypeFontGenerator
    Generates Font and Font.FontData instances from TrueType, OTF, and other FreeType supported fonts.
    FreeTypeFontGenerator.FreeTypeFontData
    Font.FontData used for fonts generated via the FreeTypeFontGenerator.
    FreeTypeFontGenerator.FreeTypeFontParameter
    Parameter container class that helps configure how FreeTypeFontGenerator.FreeTypeFontData and Font instances are generated.
    FreeTypeFontGeneratorLoader
    Makes FreeTypeFontGenerator managable via AssetManager.
    FreeTypeFontGeneratorLoader.FreeTypeFontGeneratorParameters  
    FreetypeFontLoader
    Creates Font instances from FreeType font files.
    FreetypeFontLoader.FreeTypeFontLoaderParameter  
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    FreeTypeFontGenerator.Hinting
    Font smoothing algorithm.
